title: Josep Borrell at his last FAC: it's been 4,000 days since Putin attacked Ukraine for the first time, he says. "Maybe our resp...
content: Josep Borrell at his last FAC: it's been 4,000 days since Putin attacked Ukraine for the first time, he says. "Maybe our response should have been firmer, stronger since the beginning, since 2014. Now Russia is escalating: we have to avoid this happens with impunity."
author: Live UA Map
